RunSynchronousCommand.Path: reg.exe add "HKU\DefaultUser\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\RunOnce" /v SetTaskbarSearchbox /t REG_SZ /d "reg add HKCU\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Search /v SearchboxTaskbarMode /t REG_DWORD /d 0 /f" /f

reg.exe add "HKU\DefaultUser\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\RunOnce" /v HideGalleryExplorer /t REG_SZ /d "reg add HKCU\Software\Classes\CLSID\{e88865ea-0e1c-4e20-9aa6-edcd0212c87c} /v System.IsPinnedToNameSpaceTree /t REG_DWORD /d 0 /f" /f

reg.exe add "HKU\DefaultUser\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\RunOnce" /v HideHomeExplorer1 /t REG_SZ /d "reg add HKCU\Software\Classes\CLSID\{f874310e-b6b7-47dc-bc84-b9e6b38f5903} /d CLSID_MSGraphHomeFolder /f /ve" /f

reg.exe add "HKU\DefaultUser\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\RunOnce" /v HideHomeExplorer2 /t REG_SZ /d "reg add HKCU\Software\Classes\CLSID\{f874310e-b6b7-47dc-bc84-b9e6b38f5903} /v System.IsPinnedToNameSpaceTree /t REG_DWORD /d 0 /f" /f

reg.exe add "HKU\DefaultUser\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\RunOnce" /v RemoveOneDrive /t REG_SZ "reg.exe delete HKCU\\Software\\Microsoft\\Windows\\CurrentVersion\\Run /v OneDriveSetup /f" /f
reg.exe add "HKU\DefaultUser\Control Panel\International\User Profile" /v HttpAcceptLanguageOptOut /t REG_DWORD /d 0 /f
reg.exe add "HKLM\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Windows Defender Security Center\Notifications" /v DisableNotifications /t REG_DWORD /d 1 /f
